chapters.title: Introduction to Financial Literacy
chapters.summary: This chapter provides an overview of financial literacy and its importance in making informed financial decisions. It discusses the basic concepts and principles of financial education.

chapters.title: Financial Literacy in the Digital Age
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the impact of the digital age on financial literacy. It discusses how technology has changed the way we manage money and the new skills required to navigate the digital financial landscape.

chapters.title: Budgeting in the Digital Era
chapters.summary: This chapter focuses on budgeting strategies in the digital age. It covers the use of digital tools and apps for creating and managing budgets, tracking expenses, and achieving financial goals.

chapters.title: Saving and Investing in a Tech-Driven World
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the importance of saving and investing in the digital age. It discusses various digital platforms and tools that facilitate saving and investing, and how to make the most of them.

chapters.title: Risk Management in the Digital Financial Landscape
chapters.summary: This chapter addresses the risks associated with digital financial management. It covers topics such as online fraud, data security, and strategies for minimizing financial risks in the digital age.
